description: During the internship at PT Panasonic Manufacturing Indonesia, responsibilities included assembling and testing the quality of audio products to meet company standards. Additionally, tasks involved troubleshooting components, documenting test results, and collaborating with the production team to improve manufacturing line efficiency.

During my internship at CV. Omah IoT, I was responsible for designing, programming, and testing IoT systems, as well as analyzing data to optimize device performance. I also prepared technical documentation and testing reports to support the development of future projects.
